A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was fun while it lasted.  This movie could be the Jar Jar Binks of the Disney era. In short it sucks! But not only does it suck! They killed enough characters and destroyed enough storylines\, they effectively wrecked the next movie too.\n\nI wanted to like it\, hell\, I wanted to love it\, but I can't be it sucked big ones.
